amendment.description: To increase the amounts provided under Defense Health Program and RDT&E for the Army for research and development relating to leishmaniasis, the skin ailment resulting from parasitic sand flies in Iraq, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3329 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3329 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To increase the amounts provided under Defense Health Program and RDT&E for the Army for research and development relating to leishmaniasis, the skin ailment resulting from parasitic sand flies in Iraq, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3329 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3329 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle.
